_sText:
Well this was a project that i started about 3 months ago, i started this project because of a friend who kept bugging me to make a jail map for Garry's Mod. But it quickly turned into a CS:S map, although i might come out with a version for Garry's Mod if their is a big enough request.

Well here are the details for this map;
- Large cages
- Fully Stocked Armory
- Realistic feel
- Vents
- Soccer

And other thing that you can find by your selves.

And FYI i did add the decals with Pakrat and there are NO VIRUSES

About 75% into this map i decided to make this map for one of my favorite server.

{TG}

Here is their IP if u want to check it out.

69.162.88.108:27015

Well that it about this map I hope u enjoy it as much as i did making it!
